text: Paz Vega (also Paz Campos Trigo; born January 2, 1976) is a Spanish actress. In the 2009 movie Triage, she played Elena. In the 2004 movie Spanglish she played Flor Moreno.Screen World: 2005 Film Annual, eds. John Willis; Barry Monush (New York: Applause; Northam: Roundhouse, 2006), p. 167 Paz Vega was born in Seville, Andalusia. ==References== Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish movie actors Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:People from Seville
title: Paz Vega
